snippet: The winged Oculus is by far the most conspicuous element of the World Trade Center Transportation Hub, which is nearing completion in Lower Manhattan after 10 years.
abstract: Workers hoist 5,700-pound glass panel into place atop Oculus pavilion at Santiago Calatrava's World Trade Center Transportation Hub, which is taking final form after prolonged construction; panel forms skylight that will be opened to the elements for 102 minutes each Sept 11 as part of ceremony commemorating the 2001 terrorist attack.
lead_paragraph: The winged Oculus is by far the most conspicuous element of the World Trade Center Transportation Hub, which is nearing completion in Lower Manhattan after 10 years.

headline.main: Retractable Skylight in World Trade Center Oculus Takes Final Form
headline.print_headline: Retractable Skylight in World Trade Center’s Winged Oculus Takes Final Form

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
